title: Refrigerator OVERLOAD PTCR COMBO
description: Refrigerator OVERLOAD PTCR COMBO ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 5 Reviews PartSelect Number PS2577842 Manufacturer Part Number WR07X10131
symptoms: Fridge and Freezer are too warm

installationInstructions.author: Suezy from MONROVIA, MD
installationInstructions.title: Loud clicking noise and the temperature was not stable.
installationInstructions.content: Took out the old parts and replaced it with the new parts.  The new OVERLOAD PTCR COMBO was different then the one that we replaced so we called customer service and they told us which wire to insert into each of the 2 slots and it is working like new again.  Outstanding and knowledgeable customer service.
